plot: Two angels from an old war are sent to notify families that their loved ones have been killed in Iraq. After a long week, one Angel gives up and decides he knows a better way.
title: War Cry
plot_es: Two angels from an old war are sent to notify families that their loved ones have been killed in Iraq. After a long week, one Angel gives up and decides he knows a better way.
plot_en: Two angels from an old war are sent to notify families that their loved ones have been killed in Iraq. After a long week, one Angel gives up and decides he knows a better way.
